title: Data Oculus
description:
Data Oculus provides in-depth data profiling, quality & contract as a service for all public datasets empowering data scientists & analysts to easily extract maximum value from available public dataset with seamless integration with Kaggle and Google cloud.
Long term vision for Data Oculus is to be a Datadog for data. To provide real-time monitoring, detection, prevention and remediation capabilities so that it can be a self-serve tool for anybody to use for their need.
